title: Dancing With Our Hands Tied
lyrics: I, I loved you in secret<BREAKER>First sight, yeah, we love without reason<BREAKER>Oh, twenty-five years old<BREAKER>Oh, how were you to know, and<BREAKER>My, my love had been frozen<BREAKER>Deep blue, but you painted me golden<BREAKER>Oh, and you held me close<BREAKER>Oh, how was I to know that

I could've spent forever with your hands in my pockets<BREAKER>Picture of your face in an invisible locket<BREAKER>You said there was nothing in the world that could stop it<BREAKER>I had a bad feeling<BREAKER>And darling, you had turned my bed into a sacred oasis<BREAKER>People started talking, putting us through our paces<BREAKER>I knew there was no one in the world who could take it<BREAKER>I had a bad feeling

But we were dancing<BREAKER>Dancing with our hands tied, hands tied<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>Like it was the first time, first time<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>Dancing with our hands tied, hands tied<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>And I had a bad feeling<BREAKER>But we were dancing

I, I loved you in spite of<BREAKER>Deep fears that the world would divide us<BREAKER>So, baby, can we dance<BREAKER>Oh, through an avalanche?<BREAKER>And say, say that we got it<BREAKER>I'm a mess, but I'm the mess that you wanted<BREAKER>Oh, 'cause it's gravity<BREAKER>Oh, keeping you with me

I could've spent forever with your hands in my pockets<BREAKER>Picture of your face in an invisible locket<BREAKER>You said there was nothing in the world that could stop it<BREAKER>I had a bad feeling

But we were dancing<BREAKER>Dancing with our hands tied, hands tied<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>Like it was the first time, first time<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>Dancing with our hands tied, hands tied<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>(Ooh, we had our hands tied)<BREAKER>And I had a bad feeling<BREAKER>But we were dancing

I'd kiss you as the lights went out<BREAKER>Swaying as the room burned down<BREAKER>I'd hold you as the water rushes in<BREAKER>If I could dance with you again<BREAKER>I'd kiss you as the lights went out<BREAKER>Swaying as the room burned down<BREAKER>I'd hold you as the water rushes in<BREAKER>If I could dance with you again

Dancing with our hands tied, hands tied<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>Like it was the first time, first time<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>Dancing with our hands tied, hands tied<BREAKER>Yeah, we were dancing<BREAKER>And I had a bad feeling<BREAKER>But we were dancing<BREAKER>Hands tied, hands tied
